June 17, 2017 D Berner Oberländische Musiktage (Entertainments Contest)
Berner Oberländische Musiktage (Third Section) 30 Set Test and Own Choice Berner Oberländische Musiktage berner-oberlandische-musiktage-third-section
Switzerland
Third
Entertainments Contest
Frutigen, BE, Switzerland 3/4 2017 [Kreis 4]
7 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind).
max. 10 Points for each - Entertainment, Motto (Programme) and Music / Winner gets Prize Money CHF 300.- / also Jury: Ueli Schmid, Beatrice Simon (Editor and Politician)
Winner: MG Reutigen (Wind Band), Programme 'Disneys Festival der Tiere' / no Results (Points) available
